basics.name: Ethan Chiu
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Electrical Engineering in the Department of Electrical & Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in 2027.

work.company: Applied Research Lab at the University of Hawaii
highlights: Design and integrate sensing systems, developing software, firmware, and hardware interfaces for multiple environmental sensors

Developed a real-time data collection, storage, and visualization pipeline for deployment on single-board computer (SBC) platforms using Python, Docker, Fluent Bit, PostgreSQL, Loki, Grafana, and other related tools
Created custom printed circuit boards to streamline integration between sensors and SBCs, accelerating prototyping workflows
Designed custom lightweight Docker images for high-frequency sensor data acquisition, reducing setup overhead and improving portability across SBC platforms

Implemented embedded Linux hardware configuration mechanisms (device tree overlays and udev rules) to modify UART baud rates, adjust I2C clock frequencies, and enable a PPS GPIO to maintain sub-microsecond timing accuracy for an on-device NTP server

work.company: Applied Research Lab at the University of Hawaii
highlights: Developed embedded firmware in the Arduino environment for reconfigurable wireless sensor packages that collect, store, and transmit positional and environmental data

Implemented point-to-point radio networking to enable multi-node wireless communication with a centralized ground station, a real-time operating system (FreeRTOS) to schedule concurrent tasks, and Google’s Protocol Buffers format for efficient data serialization and transmission
Developed, tested, and deployed a reusable template for use across multiple existing Python libraries that provide control over lab automation equipment

Utilized the Cookiecutter command-line utility with packaging and dependency management (Poetry), testing (Nox and Pytest), CI/CD (Github Actions), documentation (Sphinx) and publishing tools (PyPI), among others

awards.title: Dr. Arthur R. King, Jr. Scholarship
Kulia I Ka Nu'u Award
awards.summary: Awarded to students who continuously demonstrated a commitment to excellence and consistently performed with outstanding proficiency and skill in all components of ULS’s programs; awarded in math, physics, and band

awards.title: Breakthrough Innovation Challenge Finalist
awards.summary: The UH Breakthrough Innovation Challenge is an entrepreneurial competition where participants pitch their innovative business idea to a panel of judges, for a chance to win cash prizes

awards.title: Jetson A.I. Specialist
awards.summary: Recognition of competency in Jetson and AI using a hands-on, project-based assessment
